channel.title: Few Questions about VPS
channel.description:
Well, my friend recently quit RSPS, and gave me his VPS, and source. So i have a few questions.. lool
1. I don't need to port forward if i'm using a Linux VPS, do i?
2. How do i get my source onto www.vpslogin.com ?
3. He mentioned something about www.hazenet.co.uk , what is it?
Thanks a ton in advance. :)
